passives.name: Supremacy
passives.effects: Increase your '''total''' {{as|attack damage}}, {{as|ability power}}, {{as|attack speed}}, {{as|'''maximum''' health}}, {{as|armor}}, {{as|magic resistance}}, and {{as|ability haste}} by 26%, further increased by {{fd|1.2}}% for each round you win and reduced by 3% for each round you lose.
